byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: DNB repts damage to Brit warships in battle in which Brit admitted damage to destroyer Javelin heavier than first claimed
snippet: LONDON, Dec. 1--The Admirally announced tonight the loss of the submarine Triad, 1,090 tons, but added that a patrol of fast British motor boats had torpedoed the......

headline.main: NAZI VESSEL IS HIT BY TORPEDO BOATS; British 'Mosquito' Craft Dare Fire of Warship to Attack Ship Bearing Supplies Thetis Sister Ship Is Lost Raider Active, Berlin Says
